article_title: Okaloosa County Sheriff's Office investigates death of pedestrian
article_text:
The Okaloosa County Sheriff’s Office is investigating a fatal accident involving a pedestrian trying to cross Highway 98 in Destin around 10 p.m. Friday night.

Albert Frank Digiovanna, 62, was struck by a car in the westbound

lanes near Marler Street and was pronounced dead at the scene.

Witnesses say Digiovanna was dressed in dark clothing. Officials say there were no initial signs of driver impairment.

A portion of Highway 98 was closed from around 10 p.m. to 3 a.m.

The investigation is still ongoing. No other details have been released at this time.
